column4: you auto hide your panel and still see a little bit of it is that what your trying to fix?
yes I want to see as little as possible  and at some point I think I did it down to 1 pixel somewhere in gconf-editor
ok gconf-editor /apps / panel/ toplevel /top_panel_sreen0 for top panel set it to auto hide and uncheck animations then set auto hide size to what you like mine is -5
I guess there will be something similar for bottom_panel as well
yes you can also change the hide unhide time
